original: Dyberg, Per Albert, läroverksadjunkt, Linköping, f. 3/1/90 i Ystad av Evald D. o. Hanna Jönsdotter. G. 26 m. Ingeborg Jönsson. — Stud:ex. i Ystad 10, fil. mag. i Lund 15, kurs i välläsn. där 19 sam-t eng. stud. 19-20, provår 22-23. Stud:resa t. Tyskl. 11. Vik. adj. v. Malmö realsk. 17, e. o. i Ystad s. å., vik. adj. där 18-19, e. o. i Vaxholm 20-21, vik. adj. i Karlstad 21-22, vik. lektor i Lund 23, e. o. i Ystad 23-28, vik. adj. i Linköp. 28-29, timlär. i tyska v. Linköp. yrkes-sk. 28, vik. adj. i Vadstena 29-30, v. Linköp. h. a. 1. 31, adj. i modersm. o. tyska där sed. 31.
translated: Dyberg, Per Albert, high school teacher, Linköping, born on January 3rd, 1890 in Ystad to Evald D. and Hanna Jönsdotter. Married Ingeborg Jönsson in 1926. He obtained his high school diploma in Ystad in 1910, a Bachelor of Arts in Lund in 1915, a course in advanced reading there in 1919, and studied English in 1919-1920, with a probationary year in 1922-1923. He undertook a study trip to Germany in 1911. He was a substitute teacher at Malmö Realskola in 1917, an assistant teacher in Ystad in the same year, a substitute teacher there in 1918-1919, an assistant teacher in Vaxholm in 1920-1921, a substitute teacher in Karlstad in 1921-1922, a substitute lecturer in Lund in 1923, an assistant teacher in Ystad in 1923-1928, a substitute teacher in Linköping in 1928-1929, a part-time teacher of German at Linköping vocational school in 1928, a substitute teacher in Vadstena in 1929-1930, and a teacher at Linköping higher secondary school since 1931, teaching Swedish and German.
